data.text: @ConestogaC What is the maximum time the college takes to give an offer letter ?

@ConestogaC My son was not able to access his online courses at Conestoga College on March 4 because he couldn’t provide the proof of vaccination. Ironically, Ontario just ended the proof-of-vaccination system on March 1. It was the darkest day for all unvaccinated students at Conestoga.
@ConestogaC The FAQ doesn't answer my question at all, this leads me to bel6ive that you have not properly planned any contingencies for this scenario
@Ethan_uwu Please visit the FAQs on the COVID Information Hub for steps to take if you'll be missing classes, due dates or assessments: https://t.co/FQNsuAcpgg
@ConestogaC Is your administration staff still going to be online

@ConestogaC My son was not able to access his online course at Conestoga College on March 4, 2022. He was removed from his program by the College because he couldn’t provide the proof of vaccination. Ironically, Ontario just ended the proof-of-vaccination system on March 1.
@ConestogaC What happens if a student gets covid and cannot attend?
